verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:10
verses.text: That which hath been is named already, and it is known that it is man: neither may he contend with him that is mightier than he.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:11
verses.text: Seeing there be many things that increase vanity, what is man the better?

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:12
verses.text: For who knoweth what is good for man in this life, all the days of his vain life which he spendeth as a shadow? for who can tell a man what shall be after him under the sun?
